4. Patrick O. Council

Patrick O. Council
==================

South Ward Council Member
-------------------------

Councilman Patrick O. Council is a consistent and visible leader with over 20 years of administrative experience and community advocacy. As South Ward Council Member, he has been at the forefront of transformative change and grassroots engagement, working tirelessly to uplift and empower residents throughout the ward and across the City of Newark.

Known for his ability to unify and build collaborations, Councilman Council plays a vital role in connecting residents, community leaders, and organizations to foster meaningful partnerships and expand access to essential resources. His background as a former educator and school board member fuels his deep commitment to equity and progress in Newark’s educational system.

A lifelong advocate for both youth and seniors, he has led numerous initiatives that connect families to vital programs, services, and support networks. His leadership is rooted in community, compassion, and action.

Councilman Council brings energy, vision, and a results-oriented mindset to the City Council. He is deeply committed to refocusing, reimagining, and rebuilding a stronger and better South Ward—one that serves as a model for progress and equity throughout Newark.
